nodes.text: The Republic Detention Center was a facility located in Pols Anaxes that was converted to a detention center from an old naval training branch facility. It was the location where Ruusaan Skirata was being held as a POW. It was called RDC PolAx in GAR signals.

Bardan Jusik, Fi Skirata, and former ARC Troopers Spar and Sull rescued Ruusaan while posing as three regular clone troopers and Bardan as a detainee brought to "identify" the prisoner. The facility was commanded by a Clone Lieutenant from the 55th Mechanized Brigade. Fi thought this was a waste of the lieutenant's skills until he noticed that the lieutenant had been wounded, which gave hope that there was a soldiering life after being injured.
